comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: chore: Included githubactions in the dependabot config
pull_request.body:
This should help with keeping the GitHub actions updated on new releases. This will also help with keeping it secure.

Dependabot helps in keeping the supply chain secure https://docs.github.com/en/code-security/dependabot

GitHub actions up to date https://docs.github.com/en/code-security/dependabot/working-with-dependabot/keeping-your-actions-up-to-date-with-dependabot

https://github.com/ossf/scorecard/blob/main/docs/checks.md#dependency-update-tool
Signed-off-by: naveen <172697+naveensrinivasan@users.noreply.github.com>

issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

issue.body:
We have rules to block new type of ads, but if that does not help, follow the instruction below.
Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should to install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:

comment.body:
We do not block elements which are just links to a website’s communities in social networks.
<details><summary>Screenshots</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/171790688-b5463ab9-e484-4c59-9a38-88d30aef84f7.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/171790699-3a792baa-70c5-4ec9-b168-86cce00fc2c8.png)

</details>

It seems that these icons/links are blocked by one of the third-party filters, so it should be fixed in this filter list.

issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

comment.body: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/115262#issuecomment-1145536643 нужно установить наш скрипт, для этого посмотрите инструкцию в первом посте.

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

issue.title: statcounter.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

Adguard home v0.108.0-b.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gs.statcounter.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

"||statcounter.com^" breakes the normal website. It seems that it shouldn't be blocked on a DNS level.
<details> 
![Screenshot_20220530-153751_Firefox Nightly](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26865145/170941717-e50ff378-c6f1-4b62-98f7-b1f0791b73e7.png)
</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mal.ru](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmal.ru) ### Comment > Пользуюсь приложением почты mail. ru и раньше всю рекламу благополучно блокировал adgusrd. Но последние дни, в приложении в верху постоянно висит реклама, и никак её нельзя заблокировать. comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://pelisplus.one/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelisplus.one%2F) ### Comment > Doesnt block bet365 , keeps showing no matter what . Show separate window all the time for bet 365 site. I block all widows from bet365 but site still showing after all. More than 20 times i block and doesnt work. I keep filter copy on notepad , just in case i have to use another device or in case of update browser extensions. I did AdGuard update , i mean, off and on /unable and able/ again today 02/06/2022 using Edge. Other devices (desktop computer and tablet) show same problem with bet365 site. > English not mi first language, sorry and thanks in advance . comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://powerampapp.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpowerampapp.com%2F) ### Comment > В целом, AdGuard работает корректно со всеми приложениями, установленными на смартфоне. Проблема заключается в том, что приложение Poweramp не загружает обложки под любым вайфаем. Под LTE или любым другим мобильным протоколом связи обложки загружаются. > Если в меню Настройки приложений-Poweramp-Настройки-Защита AdGuard выключить полностью защиту, то проблема загрузки обложек под вайфаем исчезает. > Если последовательно отключать все другие опции в Настройки приложений-Poweramp-Настройки, кроме Защита AdGuard, проблема с загрузкой не решается. > Под мобильными протоколами всё работает. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
If I'm not wrong, it's related to this - https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters#cosmetic-rules-priority-1

This element has `display: inherit !important;` which it seems that has a higher priority/specificity than added rule.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/171875201-c47ba883-3490-46e2-a9e4-486342eda236.png)

</details>

Making rule with higher priority/specificity should fixes it.
For example:
```
twitterperlen.de##body .code-block
```

We have rules to block new type of ads, but if that does not help, follow the instruction below.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
